verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of A Multitude <S%G3793><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hallelujah : <S%G239><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> To The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God : <S%G2257><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> True <S%G228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteous Are <S%G1342><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2920><s%> His Judgments; <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> He Judged <S%G2919><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harlot <S%G4204><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Corrupted <S%G5351><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4202><s%> Her Fornication, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Did Avenge <S%G1556><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of His <S%G846><s%> At <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Her Hand. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Second Time <S%G1208><s%> They Said, <S%G2046><s%> Hallelujah. <S%G239><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2586><s%> Her Smoke <S%G846><s%> Goes Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Fell Down <S%G4098><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Twenty <S%G1501><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Four, <S%G5064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures <S%G2226><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Throne, <S%G2362><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Amen, <S%G281><s%> Hallelujah. <S%G239><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Came Forth, <S%G1831><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Praise <S%G134><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God <S%G2257><s%> All Ye <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> His Bondmen, <S%G846><s%> And Ye <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Who Fear <S%G5399><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Small <S%G3398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of A Multitude <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Waters <S%G5204><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Thunders <S%G1027><s%> Strong, <S%G2478><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hallelujah, <S%G239><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Has Reigned The <S%G936><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

We Should Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Should Exult; <S%G21><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To Him; <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Marriage <S%G1062><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb, <S%G721><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> Did Make Ready <S%G2090><s%> Herself. <S%G1438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> She Should Be Clothed In <S%G4016><s%> Fine Linen, <S%G1039><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bright; <S%G2986><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Fine Linen <S%G1039><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Righteousnesses <S%G1345><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints. <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Write, <S%G1125><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Are They Who <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Supper <S%G1173><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Marriage <S%G1062><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> Are Called. <S%G2564><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> True <S%G228><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Fell <S%G4098><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> To Do Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> See Thou Do It <S%G3708><s%> Not. <S%G3361><s%> Fellow Bondman <S%G4889><s%> Of Thee <S%G4675><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Of Thy <S%G4675><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3141><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Do Homage. <S%G4352><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Testimony <S%G3141><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Prophecy. <S%G4394><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%>, Opened, <S%G455><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Horse <S%G2462><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> True <S%G228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> He Judges <S%G2919><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Makes War. <S%G4170><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> His Were <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Flame <S%G5395><s%> Of Fire, <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Diadems <S%G1238><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Name <S%G3686><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Knows <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> Himself, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> A Garment <S%G2440><s%> Dipped <S%G911><s%> In Blood; <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Armies <S%G4753><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Were Following <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Horses <S%G2462><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> Clothed In <S%G1746><s%> Fine Linen, <S%G1039><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pure. <S%G2513><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth <S%G846><s%> Goes Forth <S%G1607><s%> A Sword <S%G4501><s%> Sharp, <S%G3691><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> He Might Smite <S%G3960><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations; <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Shall Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Rod <S%G4464><s%> An Iron; <S%G4603><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Treads <S%G3961><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Press <S%G3025><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Upon His <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Garment <S%G2440><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3382><s%> His Thigh <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Written, <S%G1125><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Kings <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of Lords. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun; <S%G2246><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Cried <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G3732><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Fly <S%G4072><s%> In <S%G1722><s%>, Mid Heaven, <S%G3321><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gather Yourselves <S%G4863><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Supper <S%G1173><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Eat <S%G5315><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Of Kings, <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Of Chief Captains, <S%G5506><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Of Strong Men, <S%G2478><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Of Horses <S%G2462><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Of All, <S%G3956><s%> Free <S%G1658><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bond, <S%G1401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Small <S%G3398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Armies <S%G4753><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> To Make <S%G4160><s%> War <S%G4171><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Horse, <S%G2462><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Army <S%G4753><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Taken <S%G4084><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G5127><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> False Prophet <S%G5578><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Wrought <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Misled <S%G4105><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Received <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mark <S%G5480><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Do Homage <S%G4352><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1504><s%> To His Image. <S%G846><s%> Alive <S%G2198><s%> Were Cast <S%G906><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lake <S%G3041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Fire <S%G4442><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Burns <S%G2545><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brimstone; <S%G2303><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Were Killed <S%G615><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sword <S%G4501><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Horse, The Sword <S%G2462><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Goes Forth <S%G1607><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G3732><s%> Were Filled <S%G5526><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> Their Flesh. <S%G846><s%>
